metadata.title: CVE-2021-44528 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A open redirect vulnerability exists in Action Pack >= 6.0.0 that couldallow an attacker to craft a "X-Forwarded-Host" headers in combination withcertain "allowed host" formats can cause the Host Authorization middlewarein Action Pack to redirect users to a malicious website.

criterions.comment: rails package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
